page.title: 05Trade
page.content:
There are no shops in Netherton, but there is a Post Office and vans travel round . The Post Office sells sweets, pop, pens, pencils , and crisps. The types of shops in Rothbury are a china shop ,toy shop, food shop , fish and chip shop, shoe shop, chemist, cafe, sweets, hardware,clothes, newsagents,sports shop, material shop,video shop, butchers shop, bakers shop, antique shop and a sewing shop. For other things we go to Alnwick or Morpeth . Sometimes we go to the city of Newcastle . Three vans come to our house . They are the milk van, the baker's van , and the
butcher's van.
